item.title: Raichur airport project gets environment clearance
item.description:
<![CDATA[Minister for Science and Technology and Minor Irrigation N.S. Bose Raju has said that the Raichur Greenfield Airport Project has received environmental clearance from the Union Ministry of Environment and Forests that will help the region realise the dream of having air connectivity.
In a release, he said that the project will help in the development of backward Kalyan Karnataka region....]]>

item.title: Green Signal from Environment Ministry for Raichur Greenfield Airport
item.description:
<![CDATA[Bengaluru: The Union Ministry of Environment has approved for the construction of the Greenfield airport in Raichur, marking a significant milestone for the region. Expressing his delight, Minister for Minor Irrigation and Science & Technology, N.S. Boseraju, stated that the long-cherished dream of an airport in Raichur, the gateway to Kalyana Karnataka, is now closer to reality.
In a press release, the minister emphasised the state government's commitment to establishing the Greenfield airport...]]>

item.title: Circle Inspector, Sub-Inspector of Police placed under suspension in Raichur
item.description:
<![CDATA[The Circle Inspector and the Sub-Inspector of Police of Raichur West Police Station have been placed under suspension after a case was booked in connection with the death of a man in the city.
Raichur Superintendent of Police M.
